2022

That one certain photo

turned my January upside down,

I was about to fall

and hurt my ego.

Someone recommended

a song to me with

a touch of forlorn

and caused me to mourn

for the whole of February.


A vintage t-shirt and

a lousy cheek tint

changed my point of view.

A wink given by someone

and an insult turned me

to look like a foe,

but somehow the whole of March,

April, and May made me grow.


It was June when someone

forgot about me.

she left, even though

I didn't agree.

And on the night of July,

I celebrated,

for I thought finally I'd be free.


But August appeared and ruined my faith.

She shows in my dreams every night,

reminding me I should wait.

But September woke me up

from a nightmare.

Summer has passed, and I must stop

wearing the coat of the past.


October almost dropped me.

I got scared to be buried

from my favourite memories,

so I swallowed my pride and

loved her still until November.

But I can't promise if I will still do

once December ends.
